longDescription: BTL EMSELLA® is a medical-grade chair that emits high-intensity focused electromagnetic (HIFEM) energy. Each 28-minute session induces over 11,000 supramaximal pelvic floor contractions—far beyond what manual Kegels can achieve. The treatment strengthens the levator ani, restores neuromuscular control, and improves blood flow to the pelvic organs.\n\nWe prescribe EMSELLA for women facing stress incontinence, postnatal recovery, menopausal laxity, or decreased intimate sensation. Sessions are non-invasive, pain-free, and performed in a private suite while you remain fully clothed.

steps.title: Consultation & Pelvic Exam
steps.description: Medical history, pad test, and muscle grading.

steps.title: Review & Maintenance
steps.description: Retest at weeks 6 and 12; boosters every 6 months.

schema.howPerformed: You sit fully clothed on a specialized chair that looks like a comfortable seat. High-intensity focused electromagnetic energy (HIFEM) passes through your clothing and penetrates deep into your pelvic floor muscles. This triggers thousands of supramaximal contractions—far more intense than you could ever do manually. It feels like deep pulsing and tingling, never painful. Each 28-minute session delivers over 11,000 perfect Kegel contractions, rebuilding strength and bladder control
schema.preparation: Come in comfortable, breathable clothing (leggings and top work perfectly). Empty your bladder just before treatment. Stay well-hydrated in the days leading up to your session. No special prep needed—this is the easiest pelvic treatment you'll ever have. Bring headphones if you'd like to listen to music or podcasts during the session
schema.followup: Resume all activities immediately—work, exercise, intimacy, everything. Drink plenty of water to support muscle recovery. You might feel muscles working for a few hours afterward (like after a good workout). Attend all 6 sessions for best results—consistency is key. Many women notice fewer leaks after just 2-3 sessions, with full results by week 6. Maintenance sessions every 6-9 months keep muscles strong
schema.outcome: Bladder control improves dramatically—no more leaks when laughing, coughing, running, or jumping. Pelvic floor feels stronger and tighter. Intimacy improves as muscles gain tone and sensation. Posture gets better as your core stabilizes. Confidence returns—no more worrying about finding bathrooms or wearing pads. Many women say it's life-changing, especially for new moms and menopausal women. Results last 6-9 months with maintenance
schema.treatmentFrequency: 6 sessions over 3 weeks (twice weekly), then maintenance sessions every 6-9 months to keep muscles strong. Many women add boosters before holidays or high-activity periods
schema.adverseOutcome: Mild muscle soreness for a few hours (like after exercise). Temporary pelvic tingling sensation. Very rarely, slight increase in urge to urinate immediately after (settles quickly). No lasting side effects
contraindication: Metal IUD without doctor clearance (we'll check with your provider)
Recent pelvic surgery (within 6 weeks—need surgeon clearance)
Severe pelvic organ prolapse requiring surgery
typicalTest: Pelvic floor muscle strength assessment (manual exam)
Pad test to measure leakage amount
Discussion of symptoms and quality of life impact

overview.content: EMSELLA’s HIFEM energy penetrates deep into the pelvic floor, causing supramaximal contractions that strengthen the levator ani and surrounding musculature. This improves continence, posture, and sexual satisfaction. Sessions take place in private suites; you simply sit on the chair fully clothed while it does the work.

howItWorks.subtitle: Beyond traditional Kegels
howItWorks.content: HIFEM energy depolarises motor neurons, causing supramaximal contractions that recruit 100% of the pelvic floor muscle fibres. This re-educates neuromuscular control, increases blood flow, and builds muscle density for long-term support.

faq.question: Does EMSELLA hurt?
faq.answer: No—it feels like gentle tingling and deep contractions. You control the intensity and we can adjust settings during the session. Most women read or relax during treatment.

faq.question: Do I need to undress for EMSELLA?
faq.answer: No. You remain fully clothed throughout—just wear comfortable clothing and sit on the chair. This makes it the easiest pelvic treatment you'll ever have.

faq.question: How soon will I see EMSELLA results?
faq.answer: Many women notice fewer leaks after 2-3 sessions. Full results peak around week 6 after completing the course. Continence, sensation, and posture all improve progressively.

faq.question: How much does EMSELLA cost in London?
faq.answer: The Core Pelvic Strength Plan (6 sessions) is £900 (save £150). The Confidence Combo with Ultra Femme is £1,750 (save £350). Continence Mastery with O-Shot is £2,050 (save £450). Consultation fee (£100) is credited toward packages.

faq.question: How many EMSELLA sessions do I need?
faq.answer: The standard course is 6 sessions over 3 weeks (twice weekly). Most women achieve excellent results with this protocol. Booster sessions every 6-9 months maintain strength long-term.

faq.question: Is EMSELLA safe with an IUD?
faq.answer: Most copper and hormonal IUDs are fine, but we confirm with your consultant before treatment. Metal IUDs may require additional clearance.

faq.question: How often do I need EMSELLA maintenance?
faq.answer: We recommend booster sessions every 6-9 months to maintain pelvic floor strength. Many women schedule before holidays, marathons, or high-activity periods.

faq.question: Can EMSELLA help with intimacy?
faq.answer: Yes—stronger pelvic floor muscles increase sensation and circulation during intimacy. Many women report improved orgasm quality and confidence. Pairs well with O-Shot for enhanced results.
